typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as decimal(10,0),
		{2003} as decimal(10,0),
		{2004} as decimal(10,0),
		{2005} as decimal(10,0),
		{2006} as decimal(10,0),
		{2007} as decimal(10,0),
		{2008} as decimal(10,0),
		{2009} as decimal(10,0),
		{2010} as decimal(10,0),
		{2011} as decimal(10,0),
		{2012} as decimal(10,0),
		{2013} as decimal(10,0),
		{2014} as decimal(10,0),
		{2015} as decimal(10,0),
		{2016} as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GDP
source(output(
		TableName as string,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string,
		SpecialNotes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
GDP derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 pivot(groupBy({Country Name}),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1, source2 join({Country Name} == TableName,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
